name: Mastery Talisman: Battle Ready
description:
Your characters with Weapon Cards attached deal +1 DMG.
After your characters use a Skill: If this character has a Weapon Card attached, return the Weapon Card to your Hand, and the next time you play a Weapon Card, spend 2 fewer Elemental Dice. (Each character can trigger this once per Round)
descriptionraw: Your characters with Weapon Cards attached deal +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters use a Skill:</color> If this character has a Weapon Card attached, return the Weapon Card to your Hand, and the next time you play a Weapon Card, spend 2 fewer Elemental Dice. (Each character can trigger this once per Round)
